attributes.action: All information on chemtrails to be made publicly available
attributes.additional_details:
We call for all information and documents, whether digital or non-digital (including goverment emails) relating to chemtrails to be made available to the general public.

Many UK citizens are concerned about the growing number of unnatural clouds being produced by passing aircraft. These clouds often stretch the whole sky and remain there for hours, unlike condensation or contrails, which dissipate quickly as is usual for aircraft emmisions.

There are various patents (which could not be included due the terms and conditions) which show the clear intention of aircraft companies to spray the world's skies with harmful amounts of substances such as aluminium oxide for financial gain, under the guise of "reducing global warming".

This appears to be happening without the knowledge and approval of the general public, and without honestly tackling the source of the issue, which is the emmision of greenhouse gasses into the atmosphere.
